    source={
        "index": [
            "kibana_sample_data_flights"
        ],
        "query": {
            "range": {
                "DistanceKilometers": {
                    "gt": 0
                }
            }
        },
        "_source": {
            "includes": [],
            "excludes": [
                "FlightDelay",
                "FlightDelayType"
            ]

    },
    dest={
        "index": "df-flight-delays",
        "results_field": "ml-results"
    },
    analysis={
        "regression": {
            "dependent_variable": "FlightDelayMin",

    },
